pull.title: guix: strip binaries in libexec
pull.body: #31679 moved some internal binaries to `libexec/`, but the Guix build wasn't updated to stip these binaries of their debug symbols.

guix: strip binaries in libexec

31679 moved some internal binaries to libexec/, but the Guix build
wasn't updated to stip these binaries of their debug symbols.
